reviews.review:
Game is overrated. It's not bad but its just a hollow game. You just go from one section to the next killing people and then looting everything you possible see in case you miss something because some of the items are small like coins and keys. Then you move on and repeat. 

The story is interesting but ultimately confusing in the end.

I will say the devs have a good ability to create interesting aesthetics and environments but again the world is quite hollow once you get over the aesthetics of the game.

Excelente juego. La mecanica del juego cambia con referencia al 1 y 2, pero es disfrutable. Si te interesa la historia te quedaras admirando cada paisaje que veas, incluso las nuevas maquinas y "tecnologias".

Maybe in an alternate reality this is a good game.

+ good sound / music
+ interesting setting
+ columbia feels more alive than rapture
+ sky lines are a cool idea with okayish implementation

- poorly written story with plot holes
- protagonists are stupid
- bad weapon handling
- you are only allowed to carry 2 weapons at a time
- useless weapon upgrading system due to the 2 weapons issue
- ammo management is unnecessary hard due to the 2 weapons issue
- vigors are overlapping and storywise there is no real need for them
- enemy variation is meh
- replaced good mechanics from the previous bioshocks with boring button press interactions
- core gameplay is boring, repetetive and tiring
Amazing game play experience. all 3 games in the series have been good. i have to try the dlc's now. Elizabeth is the best girl ever.
玩法新颖，剧情满分有深度，游戏难度相比一代降低不少，建议困难，重点还是伊丽莎白，太i了
Awesome mechanics, full of action and somewhat challenging enemies. Great story and great immersion.

伊丽莎白，辅助的神。
傻逼杯赛多学学，别到滚6还让随从卡死我的路。
神作，我玩过所有的游戏中最好的故事，最棒的结局，游戏史上的丰碑！
One of my favourite games of all time, amazing story, shooting is extremely rewarding and fun, offers a bunch of variety in play styles and has the 2 best lead characters I've played as.
For me its the best part of bioshock series. In a way mind blowing stories with lots of twist, amazing characters that I will remember for a while and one the best DLC that I have played.

神作，补票，牛逼的剧情
realmente muito bom, porem tem uma história muito complexa então se prepare :)
nice game good story
I loved
You can do drugs

Although I don't love this game the same as Bioshock 1 & 2, it's a decent shooter that should've had a different title and premise. The gunplay is nice, however you can only carry two weapons which is a huge step down. The difficulty is definitely there even on Normal skill. The DLC's are okay, 1 is better than 2, because the story in 2 tries too much to explain a different perspective to the first game.

I recommend you try this at least once, and if you're not satisfied, just stick to the first two games.
Just sit down and play this masterpiece of a game.

More of a neutral review. The visuals are stunning and it does cap off the Bioshock series plot, but its a bit of a U-turn in terms of gameplay (now its more of an arena shooter) with some convoluted plot moments letting it down. It really feels like they changed their minds a lot whilst making this, and it shows.

It would have been a better side-game than a finale for the -shock series. DLC is good though.

這款遊戲擁有優秀的劇情和美麗鮮豔的美術場景。
操作方面維持以往，第一人稱射擊加入魔法的元素。可用的魔法非常多，但對我這個菜雞來說用起來都差不多。
這遊戲不會合每個人的胃口，但是可以一試的優秀作品。
快玩游戏盒子通关了五六次，这次补票了，我心目中最棒的三部曲游戏

One of the very few games with the ability to make me dream. The art direction is out of this world ( or out in the sky in this particular case ). The gunplay is super fun and intense, it encourages you to be on the move most of the time and to use all the tools at your disposal. You're not a tank, if you stand still you will die and lose money, which will reduces the amount of upgrades you can buy. Play good and win big !
I wish I lived up there, this little city in the sky, in this little time capsule where everything is beautiful and cheerful. Let the slums rot, nobody cares about them anyway lol.

P.S : Check the video Crowbcat made about Bioshock Infinite, it shows what the game could have been and how drastically the final product differs from the original vision.
If I could wipe my memory so that I could play this game for the first time again, I would do it no problem. 11/10. Must buy.

I personally feel this game is a tad overrated by most of the gaming world, not that the game is bad by any means, but to me it doesn't deserve all the praise it gets. I can't deny that the game looks great, has very good characters, an interesting story and setting, and solid overall mechanics. But i do personally feel it could be a lot better.

The two big problems i have with this game is the weapons/2 weapon limit, and the movement. Arguably the two most important aspects of an FPS is the guns and movement and this is where I feel the game lacks. First off the guns aren't too bad but only a few are really good without upgrades. And upgrading can be annoying since you won't have enough money to buy all the upgrades but you won't know what weapons you will have for certain parts of the game, and this issue is only made worse by the 2 weapon limit. Certain arenas were just no fun since i had to use bad/non-upgraded weapons to beat it since i ran out of ammo, not very fun. And now the movement; when the game has the skylines in the arenas they are pretty good and add a lot to the movement, but when there are no skylines it just turns into COD. Hiding behind cover waiting for shields to come back then poking out and taking a couple shots before being hit yourself and needing to go back in cover. The absence of the skylines from certain arenas just turn them into slogs since the games base movement is not good. 

But overall i can't give a negative review just because i personally feel it is overrated, so if it's on sale pick it up.

Un must play, si parla di un gioco di 2k, ed è proprio bioshock, una delle mie saghe preferite, ma questo titolo mi ha sorpreso molto. Partiamo subito con la storia fantastica che all'inizio può sembrare molto confusionaria ma dopo si chiarisce tutto, ma poi si deve parlare assolutamente delle meccaniche di combattimento basati su vigor, zipline e con boss-fight intrattenenti. lo consiglio vivamente anche a prezzo pieno ne vale la pena

[h1] [b] Enters city, instantly gets into a shootout, T R A V E L S A C R O S S T I M E. [/b] [/h1]

[b] BioShock Infinite [/b] is the third entry in the series but it's not called BioShock 3 and it has mostly nothing to do with the first two games.

[h2] Gameplay [/h2]
Gameplay has been massively altered from the first two. Booker DeWitt, the main protagonist, is given a two weapon limit(bro momento) and a regenerating shield ala Halo. Unlike the previous two games, you cannot backtrack to levels; once you change the level, there's no returning to previous ones. Sky-Lines are a mechanic that allow you to get on roller coaster like things and move at high speeds across the area, and you can do aerial attacks from them. When you die, you lose a little bit of money.

Elizabeth, that girl on most promotional art of the game, also exists gameplay wise. She can find Medkits, Salts, ammo and cash automatically, and can open "Tears"; things from alternate timelines that have no cost to use and when used strategically can be useful. Tears are at predetermined locations and can be vending machines, supplies, weapons, and more out there things.

Vigors, the games equivalent of Plasmids, are similar in use to 2. While Booker doesn't have one out at all times, it can be easily used instead of needing to be switched to. Also unlike the first two, all Vigors are free, and are collected in the environment. The only currency is Silver Eagles, which is used to buy ammo, HP and Salt packs that are instantly consumed upon use(you cannot carry medkits or power juice unlike the first two) and Vigor upgrades. Hacking is non-existent, but you can use the first Vigor you get to hijack machines even if it uses a LOT of Salts.

Instead of buying HP and Salts upgrades, you acquire those and your shield capacity with Infusions. When picking up an Infusion, you can choose which to upgrade, with being able to upgrade one thing a maximum at ten times. There are only 24 infusions in the game barring any DLC rewards, so you cannot fully upgrade all your stuff.

Gear is a thing you can also find, and are clothing items that give you passive boosts such as setting people on fire with melee. It's purely stat based and you always wear the same clothes visually.



[h2] Story [/h2]
You get sent to a flying city to wipe away a debt and [b] what the actual fuck is going on [/b]
Also aside from the confusing aspects it just feels inferior to the first two.

[h2] Graphics [/h2]
Infinite's art direction is REAL good, and the game itself looks pretty good just looking at it. However, it is definitely starting to show its age, with pretty notice-able shadow pop-in on Ultra and to todays standards pretty low res textures though they're good enough. Also Elizabeth, to me at least, looks like a fucking cartoon compared to every other human.

[h2] Verdict [/h2]
I hereby give BioShock Infinite a [b] 7/10 [/b], it's deffo inferior compared to the first two, and it doesn't help if you look at any pre-release gameplay. Here's a tip: don't look up the 2011 E3 gameplay prior to playing this if you want the most enjoyment out of it. I looked at that after I finished it but it's still pretty depressing. It's still a good game though, but not as good of a BioShock game.

I never review games, but I have to rate this game!
I don't know why I had this part of BioShock in my library for so long (never run)
This game is a freakin masterpiece!

[h1] SUA MAESTA' BIOSHOCK INFINITE!!! [/h1]

Mirabile opera videoludica dei ragazzi della Irrational Games che dal 2013 ad oggi fa ancora scuola e riesce sorprendentemente a bissare se non a superare la magnificenza gia' raggiunta nei titoli precedenti. 
Immersi in un quadro virtuale verremo accompagnti da un innovativo sistema di tutorial che con musiche e suoni ci guidera' attraverso le dettagliatissime strade di Columbia nella fiera e nella lotteria.  
Grazie ad un sublime lavoro grafico ogni ambientazione ha un che di onirico risultando una delizia per gli occhi e le orecchie, persino nella breve missione per i viottoli della capitale francese il gioco e' riuscito a farmi assaporare nuovamente l'atmosfera del mio reale soggiorno Parigino.
La trama e' qualcosa di coinvolgente che affascina e rapisce il giocatore aumentando la pulsione di svelarne gli sviluppi e tocca temi profondi come quello del r@zzismo, rivolte sociali e scelte morali.
Nelle parti finali si accentua la componente action shooting (e per qualcuno forse e' un male) ma anche in questo ambito il gameplay riesce a non scadere mai nella banalita' grazie anche all'introduzione del sistema skyline molto originale sebbene a volte  un po' caotico.
I DLC funerale in mare delinea il collegamento narrativo con gli episodi precedenti (anche se confesso di aver cercato approfondimenti e spiegazioni sulla rete... per sicurezza).
Concludendo ritengo Bioshock infinite uno dei videogiochi piu' belli del decennio che raccomando caldamente a tutti.
Astounding game great storyline, beautiful graphics and all around just so enjoyable!!!

Que jogo temos aqui meus amigos, boa história, uma melhora significativa no uso de plasmideos junto das armas para se fazer combos, além de ter um final de explodir a cabeça de qualquer um e o fato de ter duas dlcs onde uma lhe dá finalmente uma visão de como era rapture antes de bioshock 1 e outra dlc onde muda completamente o combate fazendo com que se torne algo mais stealth e que exige uma maior cautela do player.

游戏是好游戏，但是我因为这个卡关了我是不理解的。。。

生化奇兵为我打开了Steampunk世界的大门。

它在我心里埋下了一颗种子，后续在我的大学生根发芽，最后我选择了蒸汽朋克作为本科的毕业设计。

设计因为生化奇兵曾经为我带来的触动，使我愿意付诸全力，也收获一些奖项，为我坚定了信念，走上设计之路
感谢。

[h1] 意难平。[/h1]
[b]我只能用这三个字，概括这款游戏带给我的一切。[/b]
隐藏文本涉嫌剧透。
[spoiler][i]我不想拯救什么多元宇宙，我不想管哥伦比亚和销魂城的一切狗屎.
我不惧怕死亡，也不惧怕背负罪恶.
我只想带着她去巴黎。
在无限的可能性中，爱是唯一真实确定的事。
我不奢求她认我这个生父——我知道自己不配当一个父亲，更别说当她的父亲。
但是她的笑啊，即使在最黑暗的地狱里，也能点亮我残存的心。[/i] [/spoiler]
[i]Will the circle be unbroken?
By and by. By and by.
There's a better home awaiting.
In the sky. In the sky.[/i]
[h1] 意难平。[/h1]
really fun game.  great grafics and great story line.

game incrível!

This is now the best singleplayer campaign I've ever played. Every second of it was enjoyable, every character interesting. Even the similar aspects from the previous ones were perfect.
Rescuing Elizabeth was the first escort mission I surely enjoyed in my life, I really wanted to protect her and know more about her story. Not to mention that she is actually useful, she guides you, opens doors, gets you ammo and health kits, she hides and is unkillable... Not just that, you can see her interacting with the map, sitting, looking at things, she looks and acts like a real companion insted of following you like a robot.
That's not all, the combat is almost perfect, the combination of guns, vigors and tears makes you want to stay fighting a while.
The story is just magnificent, the entire city is so well created that it'll feel like an actually functional one.
It's like a Disney film, it's neat.
Great story and great graphics, beats many newer games. 100%. Would recommend.
el mejor de todos los bioshock

Finally they made a Bioshock game that works great on PC WAS IT SO HARD DEVS? Bioshock Infinite is like Bioshock 2 a decisive game with people that either love it or hate it. But i dont think anyone can deny that it was made with love and care despite its flaws. As all the games in the series the main thing that made them stand out is the incredibly story and set pieces like Rapture. infinite provides that in my opinion with a great set piece named Colombia and a fantastic (if very mindfucked) story with once again good written characters. The gunplay unfortunately became a bit consolized forcing you to only carry 2 guns as opposed to the other games but its still really fun burning and shocking your enemies. Overall this one is greatly recommended and i hope the next entry is as good if not better than the others.

Good game that still holds up well in 2022. The cloud city setting is excellent, and what I enjoyed most about the game was exploring the city. The audio logs you find throughout do a great job of telling the story of the religious zealot behind all the bad things going on. It’s definitely worth beating the game to see how the story plays out, because you will probably be surprised. It should only take you about 10 hours to beat if you power through it.

Elizabeth is a cool character and a very useful companion who stays out of your way and helps you by finding items and ammo. The loot system is limited in the variety of items you find, but searching everything is necessary because that’s mainly how you get money, gear, upgrades, and lockpicks (which are important). One thing I didn’t like was that the powers for the various gear you find (hats, shirts, pants, boots) are mostly only useful for very specific situations. I wore the first shirt I found early in the game for the entire game even though I found multiple shirts that were different. 

On normal difficulty, there were only a few fights that I thought were difficult (particularly the final fight) as someone who is not good at shooters. The weapons are pretty basic, and some of the vigors (special powers for combat) are redundant, but you can do serious damage if you figure out strategies for when to use them for maximum impact.

An hour of Bioshock that I played years ago was all the Bioshock I played before Infinite. I think Infinite is a good video game, but I don’t know if it’s a good Bioshock game. I found Infinite to be a competent shooter but nothing special in that regard. What kept me playing to the end was the world and the story.

''Tudo deve acabar, para nunca começar. Não apenas neste mundo, mas em todos os nossos''
Bioshock infinite é uma experiencia simplesmente incrível, o jogo te faz refletir sobre toda a realidade do mundo do jogo. Impossivel ficar entediado com o jogo, gameplay maravilhosa, trilha sonora incrível e não preciso nem falar da historia, obra prima da 2k
ps: esqueci de falar que a elizabeth é a mulher mais maravilhosa da historia dos jogos

Un gran juego con tema¡ática Steampunk al cual los años le ha pasado factura en lo gráfico (pero no en  lo artístico) y algunos modelos parecen fetos abortados. El gameplay es satisfactorio pero, como en lo gráficos, se puede notar que los años le han pasado factura. El ambientación de este juego es espectacular, Columbia cumple perfectamente como escenario de esta historia. La representación del racismo, la religión y el nacionalismo que practicamente estan unidos en uno, la representación de la revoluciones comunista, etc..

Sin duda un gran juego.
